meanings.definition: A private network within an organization that is used for sharing information and resources.
meanings.sent1: The intranets at our office allow us to access important documents securely.
meanings.sent2: Employees can communicate through the intranets to discuss work projects.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally uploaded a funny cat video to the intranets instead of the shared drive.
meanings.sent4: The intranets are like a hidden treasure chest full of valuable company data.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the intranets feels like exploring a secret underground tunnel.

meanings.definition: The internal website or portal used by a company for communication and collaboration among employees.
meanings.sent1: I found the new design of our company's intranets very user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The intranets provide a platform for employees to discuss ideas and projects.
meanings.sent3: Someone accidentally posted a picture of their lunch on the intranets instead of the company chat.
meanings.sent4: The intranets act as a virtual meeting room for all employees to connect.
meanings.sent5: Accessing the intranets is like stepping into a digital office space where everyone is just a click away.
